section.name: Commons SCXML Guide
section.p: This is a collection of notes about all things Commons SCXML, a scratch pad of sorts, aimed at noting down usages for the frequently needed bits of Commons SCXML and some related and interesting (to some of us) tidbits.

subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: State Chart XML (SCXML) is a general-purpose event-based state machine language that can be used in many ways.
